notes.text: These are all security issues fixed in the ffmpeg-7-7.0-3.1 package on the GA media of openSUSE Tumbleweed.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: FFmpeg 7.0 contains a heap-buffer-overflow at libavfilter/vf_tiltandshift.c:189:5 in copy_column.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
